hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bear Transition on Regulatory News Volume Spike
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes with regulatory uncertainty (MiCA/UK consultations active), when daily news volume containing 'regulation' or 'crackdown' spikes >200% above 30-day average and BTC fails to reclaim opening price within 6 hours, NEUTRAL transitions to BEAR within 24 hours with 70% accuracy.
hypothesis_content.rationale: NEUTRAL regimes are vulnerable to negative catalysts. Regulatory news spikes during uncertain periods create asymmetric selling pressure as weak hands exit and algorithmic systems detect sentiment deterioration.
entry_conditions: Active regulatory news cycle (MiCA, UK consultations, etc.)
News volume with regulatory keywords spikes >200% 30-day average
BTC fails to reclaim daily opening price within 6 hours of news spike
Crypto social sentiment turns negative (weighted sentiment < -0.3)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime transitions to BEAR or BTC drops >4% from pre-news level
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC reclaims and holds above daily open for 4+ hours

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 45% of regulatory news spikes during NEUTRAL regimes get bought immediately (V-shaped recovery) without regime transition.
